content:
Hey there! I'd like to know if there are any simple issues or simple unimplemented RFCs related to the compiler that I could help with working on. (I've read a bit of the dev guide)
I'd prefer to start with implementing features if I can to keep from having to track down bugs in a codebase I'm not familiar with.
Anyone know anything that fits this description?
Thanks :smile:

Hello, yes. I have a fairly simple RFC that you could implement within the compiler:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/blob/master/text/2867-isa-attribute.md
@James can send you an issue to work on :smile:
That would be lovely, thanks. :smile:
